definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Water is the restrictive factor for sand industry development.
sentences.chinese: 制约沙产业发展的瓶颈因素是水。

sentences.english: Fund shortage restricts the development of col leges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 资金短缺是制约高校发展的主要原因。
物种之间的竞争是频率制约的。

sentences.english: The creative period of blazing new trails is also restricted by the logical framework.
sentences.chinese: 创新的创造期同样受逻辑框架的制约。

sentences.english: The overall quality of teachers directly restrict the education reform and development.
sentences.chinese: 教师步队的整体素质直接制约着教育的改造和发铺。

sentences.english: The main reason for the slowly speed reading is the habit of reading silently many years.
sentences.chinese: 制约学生阅读速度的主要原因是多年养成的默读习惯。

sentences.english: The degree of hybridity is conditioned by the power of discourse and the effects of cross-cultural communication.
sentences.chinese: 译文杂合程度受权力话语和跨丈化交际效果的制约。

sentences.english: Debinding is the key process for Ceramic Injection Molding (CIM).
sentences.chinese: 脱脂是陶瓷注射成形工艺的制约性步骤。

sentences.english: Tianjin Harbor construction and development is restricted seriously as the land of Nanjiang Port Area is insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 南疆港区陆域不足，已严重制约港口建设及功能开发。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the gain spectra have been restrained by Gaussian apodization function.
sentences.chinese: 并且，增益谱都受到高斯变迹函数的制约。

sentences.english: At the same time, context refrains the deviation of hyperbole.
sentences.chinese: 同时，语境制约着夸张中的偏离。

sentences.english: Absolute instability is a major physics limitation in the realization of the ultimate capability of gyro-traveling-wave tube.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不稳定性是制约回旋行波管性能的主要因素之一。

sentences.english: This can be regarded as a constraint factor of the separable words and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 这也可以认为是离合词语分合的一个制约因素。

sentences.english: The financing problem has now become a choke point in developing small and middle-sized enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 融资难已经成为了制约中小企业发展的“瓶颈”。

sentences.english: Bonding reliability of electrically conductive adhesives(ECAs)is very important to their application.
sentences.chinese: 导电胶的粘接可靠性是制约其应用的主要影响因素。

sentences.english: Restrictive and stimulative quantity relationships existed among lint yield components.
sentences.chinese: 皮棉产量构成因素间存在制约与促进的数量关系。

definition: (lit.) to hold sb by the elbow/(fig.) to hold back/to impede/to handicap
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
